post.body: Good morning! My, aren't you dashing today!
Snerk! Oh, you KNOW they are!
Let's see . . . today the sky is a purply-orange. Oh! And there are marshmallow clouds.
I'm sending you some of my special Monday Motivational vibes. I actually like Mondays. (ducks and runs)
Oh, I ain't goin' NOwhere. Too many things to do.
Don't even THINK about it!
Happy NY to you, C-Head.
I believe you!
That doesn't sound right at all. Surely there's some mistake?
Oh, OK! Phew. I'm glad you're OK now. I figured it was a mistake, but I kind of freaked out after it happened.
You got it!
I wish Jon Hamm worked in MY office.
Netflix, baby!
Great post! Brought back some traumatic memories . . .
Me, too. We need Kathy! (Love your new avatar!)
Don't we all!
New blog post: http://is.gd/eAOX
Starting a 2-week crash diet today. I call it The Nude Beach Diet
Getting ready for a Mad Men marathon.
Can everyone send some positive vibes to Kathy @JunkDrawer? Her site has been hacked.
